item.title: Cool things about python (Regex)
item.description: Regex Regular expression, also called regex, is a sequence of charaters that matches other sequences with certain patterns. It is kind of like a fancy version of ctrl+f using python! Letâ€™s look at some examples of regex! library(reticulate) import re string1="We have to extract these numbers 12, 47, 48 The integers numbers are also interesting: 189 2036 314\',\' is a separator, so please extract these numbers 125,789,1450 and also these 564,90456 We like to offer you 7890$ per month in order to complete this task.
